name: It Moves On Despite
description:
Many people, royal, civilian, and soldier, have gathered in a military outpost some 100 miles from the war front. Some people are restless to end the war; others seek to fight in it, but all their hopes and plans are dashed when something catches them off guard. Will they be able to adapt to the changes?

This game was made in 24 hours for the RPI "Surprise!" Narrative Game Jam.

The controls are W-A-S-D and the arrow keys for movement and text progression.

Game Link (Works best in Google Chrome): 

http://homepages.rpi.edu/~idemaj/it_moves_on_despite_fin.html

Game made using the Bitsy Game Tool: 

https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

A wholehearted special thanks to Adam Le Doux, the Bitsy Game Tool's creator.
